SELECT X.EQUIP_SEQ , CASE WHEN X.EQUIP_SEQ IS NULL THEN 'Total' ELSE (SELECT CONCAT(M.EQUIP_NM, '
(',jmes.SF_GET_CODE_NM('1005',M.FACTORY_AREA,#{LOGIN_LOCALE}),')') FROM jmes.TBL_EQUIP M WHERE M.EQUIP_SEQ = X.EQUIP_SEQ) END AS EQUIP_NM , CASE WHEN IFNULL(X.DUTY_TIME,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(IFNULL(X.WORK_TIME,0) / X.DUTY_TIME * 100,0) END AS REAL_RATIO FROM ( SELECT A.EQUIP_SEQ , SUM(A.DUTY_TIME) AS DUTY_TIME , SUM(A.WORK_TIME) AS WORK_TIME FROM jmes.TBL_BATCH_MCT_WORK A WHERE A.BATCH_DT = DATE_FORMAT(#{BATCH_DT}, '%Y%m%d') AND A.EQUIP_SEQ IN ( SELECT M.EQUIP_SEQ FROM jmes.TBL_BATCH_MCT_WORK_EQUIP M WHERE M.BATCH_DT = DATE_FORMAT(#{BATCH_DT}, '%Y%m%d') AND M.WORK_USER_ID = #{USER_ID} ) AND A.EQUIP_SEQ IN ( SELECT EQUIP_SEQ FROM TBL_EQUIP WHERE FACTORY_AREA = #{FACTORY_AREA} ) GROUP BY A.EQUIP_SEQ WITH ROLLUP ) X ORDER BY ISNULL(X.EQUIP_SEQ) DESC, EQUIP_NM

SELECT BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(INSERT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS INSERT_DT, jmes.SF_GET_USER_NM(INSERT_ID) AS INSERT_ID FROM jmes.TBL_DASH_BOARD WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND BOARD_TYPE = '1' AND GROUP_IN_NO = '1' ORDER BY INSERT_DT DESC LIMIT 4
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM TBL_DASH_BOARD WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT BOARD_SEQ, GROUP_SEQ, GROUP_IN_NO, DEPTH, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENTS, DATE_FORMAT(INSERT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS INSERT_DT, INSERT_ID, jmes.SF_GET_USER_NM(INSERT_ID) AS USER_NM, FILE_SEQ_1 , jmes.SF_GET_FILE_ORGINAL_NM(FILE_SEQ_1,'1') AS FILE_NM_1, FILE_SEQ_2 , jmes.SF_GET_FILE_ORGINAL_NM(FILE_SEQ_2,'1') AS FILE_NM_2, FILE_SEQ_3 , jmes.SF_GET_FILE_ORGINAL_NM(FILE_SEQ_3,'1') AS FILE_NM_3 FROM jmes.TBL_DASH_BOARD WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND BOARD_SEQ = #{BOARD_SEQ}

SELECT COMMENT_SEQ, COMMENT_CONTENTS, DATE_FORMAT(INSERT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS INSERT_DT, INSERT_ID, jmes.SF_GET_USER_NM(INSERT_ID) AS USER_NM FROM jmes.TBL_DASH_BOARD_COMMENT WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND BOARD_SEQ = #{BOARD_SEQ}
